headline: Pennsylvania Sen. Bob Casey offers condolences after three Lebanon police officers are shot
author: Lori Burkholder
sentences: Pennsylvania State Attorney General Josh Shapiro also released a statement, saying his heart goes out to the Lebanon City Police Department.

LEBANON, Pa. â€”
Pennsylvania Sen. Bob Casey released a statement after three Lebanon police officers were shot on Thursday.
He also called the shootings, "A sobering reminder of the dangers our brave men and women in uniform face day after day.
My office is in touch with the local officials and ready to offer support," Casey said.
"My prayers are with these officers and their families in Lebanon County.
And they keep showing up, running towards danger anyway."
One of those officers was killed.
